text: ikuth 21 wani dina rathri 8.50 ta pamana siduwu mema wedi thabimen manikkuge jiwan pushpakumara (24) yana aya halawatha maha rohala wetha gena yana athara thura miya gos atha.

shri lankawa indiyawata kilomitar 32 k aasannaye pihitiyath shri lankawa indiyawe kotasak lesa kawadawath salakuwe nathi bawin shri lankawata wasara dahas gananak swadhinawa sitimata hakiwu bawath pawasu gammanpila mahatha ema suwisheshi aarakshawa me haraha winasha kirimata sudanam wana bawath pawasiya.

shri lankawa pura me wanawita jalabhithika rogaya pathiriyamath samanga siduwana marana sankhyawa tharamak ihala gos athi athara- eeta hethu wi aththe jala bhithika rogaya pilibandawa janathawa danuwathkamin adu thaththwayak pawathima bawa waidya anshaya wisin penwa dethi.nosalakilla, nodanuwathkama nisa wiwidha sathun mangin walandena mema jala bhithika rogaya pilibanda nisi danuwathwimak nomathi wimen siduwana pida awama kirimata apahasu wi thibe.

ara sinduwa man kalin ahala thiyanawa.

nopamini dhyana margapalayata paminima pinisa, nolabana lada dhyana aadiya labima pinisa, nodutu dhyanapala aadiya dakinu pinisa uthsaha nokarayi.

ugathkama, buddhimath bawa yanu ninda apahasa idiriye indrakhilayak se nosali thama sewawan thawath kapawimen itu kirima misa podi ewun men nahen adima nowe.

iskole yanakale oya wage klas ekakata gihin pora wage hitapu ekek ape panthi wala hitiya, dawasak ape ekekuyi ara porayi waliyak giya, apita paththak gannath ba dennama yaluwo nisa ithin anthimata gutikala watena ekage paththa gannam kiyala hitiya, habayi anthimata une ara klas giya ekata athak ussaganna denne nathuwa anith eka gahapu eka, apita hamapaththenma hina..
china sancharakayin hata shri lankawa prawardhanaya kirime aramunin mema uthsawaya sanwidhanaya kara thibini.
owunuth, wenathu sathuru rajawaruth kotte rajadhaniya ketharam kolla kawada yath, eya binda watunu sanin ithihasayen da maki giya seya.
apita ekekwath na..
habayi thawa deyak thamayi me wade apita warin wara karanna wenawa kiyana ekath mathak karanna oona..

passen pahu senaka wijesinhalath aawa..
uthuru koriyawata erehiwa balapam wadi karannayi, nayakayin depala ehidi chinayen ha rusiyawen illa sitiyeya.

ema paryeshana pathrikawa palawimath samangama, wiliyam thomsan athulu paryeshakayin wisin palamuwath, brayan hukar wisin pasuwath yodagena thibunu sankhyanamaya kramawedaye adupadu wenath boho deneku wisin penwa denu labuweya.
eeke thamayi api mota mikanisam kale.
namuth pitathin penena lesata eya nidahas rajyayak wiya.
thawath kabinat amathiwaru kihipadenek mita sulu welawakata pera janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha idiriye diwurum dunha.
eeka hadannath aasa hithena jathiye ekak.

bimathin sigarat ganimata kadayata pamini 38 hawiridi awiwahakayek ganankaraya mamayi kiya ehi siti ayekuta pitata pahara deddi kopayata path ayek ine thibu malkapana pihiyen bellata ketima nisa bimath pudgalaya ethanama miya yame siddhiyak daraniyagala polis wasame poththakanda gammanayen warthaweyi.me siddhiyen miya gos aththe ema gama padinchi wathugedara gamaralalage upali chandrathilaka (38) ayeki.
niwase thathwaya piliwela pilibandawa nositha adama apata kathakaranna dinayak saha welawak wenkaraganna .
ohuge hinawa ma prathikshepa karana bawak nopenwiya.“krishnadewa hinda me lamaya rasthiyadu wenawa.
thorathuru danaganime awiyen janathawa bala ganwima
eeka nisa aluth eka api denna oone kata hari.
eyin sithala jalaya snanaya kala api nawathath pallebaddata payinma paminiyemu.
rajyaye ayidiyoloji eka ee tharamatama prabalayi.
hadisi deshapalana pa්rashnayak 18
wedanawa nathiwenta me popi yusha tika bonta."

karunu mese wuwada brithanya palana samayedi gena ena lada mudu bim pathana yatathe dighawapi chaithyada, dighawapi wiharasthanaya sathu bhumi pramanayada, godanangili siyallada, brithanyayo owunata nathu kara gathha. 1887 warshayedi madakalapuwa disapathiwarayawa siti brithanya jathika alansan belige niyogayata anuwa, alaweli amunu aadiya prathisanskaranaya kirima sandahath, parawal sadima sandahath, dighawapi chaithyayata ayath galkanu, gadol, sellipi aadiya yoda ganini.

kolambaa nagaraya mulya ha wyaparika madhyasthanayak menma sancharaka purawarayak kirima sandaha palpath 60,000 k winasha kota dahas ganan dugi pawul palawa harimata katayuthu kirima, 2011 katunayaka nidahas welanda kalapaye wirodhatha dakwu kamkaruwanta paharadi ek ayeku ghathanaya kota wishala pirisakata thuwala sidukirimata polisiya meheya wima, thel mila ihala damimata erahiwa wirodhaya pa halawatha dhiwarayanta polis wishesha karya balakaya lawa pahara di ek ayeku ghathanaya kirima, rathupaswala parisara dushanayata erehi wirodhathawak binda damimata militariya meheyawa tharunayan thideneku mara damima saha thawath boho pirisakata thuwala sidu kota athamun aabadhitha thathwayata pawa path kirima wani dirgha kamkaru panthi wirodhi warthawakata ohu himikam kiyayi.
ee kiyanne kage hari badakata gihilla ewwath...
thiyenne langa pathaka ehema newe.

yudha hamuda sebalek premaya nisa bombayak pupuruwa gani mathale, kohombailiwala pradeshayedi pudgalayeku bombayak pupuruwagena maranaya sidukara ganimak sambandhawa mathale polisiya wimarshana aarambha kara atha.
polis niladhariniyata lingika athawara kala polis lokka kawuda?
ema thathwaya samajaye sama isawwak karama pathiriya yuthuyi.
mula indan kiyogena ennam...

ethumata ayithiyak na palath sabha pasal walata atha gahanna.
umbaa sammananiya pudgalayek mendo...

jiwithayath maranayath athara diwi gewuwan me mohotha wana wita nidahase husma podak ganimin siti.ee karira thrasthawadayen bataka ahinsaka damila janaya dan thama jiwithaye ithiri kalayawath sathutin gatha kirimata sihina dakimin sitinawa noanumanaya.awathanwuwan me mohothe gewana diwiya pilibadawa awabodhayak laba ganimata apahata wenath kisiwak nowa apa sawoma muhuna dun sunami wiwasanayama saheya.ada uthure siduwanne ida wadi misa adu nathi thama siyalu sesathama nathiwi adiwatha pamanak urama wunu me atharata padayakin pawa wandi gewu asaranayan pirisakya.dan mowunge jiwitha yathathathwayata haki ikmaninma gena aayuthu kalaya wana athara thrasthawadaya awasan wima samagama me awathan wuwan wenuwen wenadata wada boho piris ekwa hadak nagima sathutata karanayak wana athara me wenuwen warthamanaya wanawita wishala hadak nagana wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha athulu samastha eksath jathika pakshayata apa sawoma sthuthiya palakala yuthuya.ranil wikramasinhayan pawasanne owunge jiwitha sukhitha muditha karawimata nam wiwastha sansashodhananaya kriyathmaka kalayuthu bawath eya rajayata kriyathmaka kirimata kisidu badawak nomathi nisa eya sidukara ema janathawata prajathanthrawadi ayithin labadiya yuthu bawayi.eyata owunda purna sahayogaya labadena bawada pawasayi.eya nam sabawinma hoda yojanawaki apa menma owunda me ayithin bhukthi widime dadi asawaka pelenawanoanumanaya.ehethkusata aharak,hisatasewanak,gathata adumaknomathime asaranayanta mulinma diya yuththe mekada?

ebawin ketharam parajayan labuwada krida lolinge aadaraya labana jiwagunayen yuthu kandayamak adatada lankawata awashya kara thibe.eeta thaman nogalapena bawa dinesh chandimal oppu kara atha.ee anuwa krikat aayathanayata aasannathama udaharanayak pawathi,ee osteraliyawayi.thamange supirithama kridakayin depala wu stiw smith ha dewid warnar wasarakata gedara yawimata tharam nirbhitha bhawayak ema aayathanaya sathuwiya.ehi prathipalayak lesa osteraliyawa yam pasubamak laba athi bawada rahasak nowe.eheth osteraliyanu krikat aayathanaya ema paduwata wada rate gaurawaya ihalin osawa thibe.eheth osteraliyawe ese wuwath lankawe ese wanne natha.eya oppu karana ladde chandimal bera ganimata parikshanayatath perama niwedanayak nikuth kirimeni.ek athakin ehi waradak da natha.waradak kalath ee ape ekeki.

daruwan siwudena owunge mawpiyan soya bas rathayaka nagi yamin sitiyadi ehi kondostharawarayata sakasithi owun pilibanda polisiyata danum di thibe.pasuwa daruwan siwudena thel deniya adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen pasu pariwasa bharayata pathkara atha.jyeshta niyojya polispathi gamini nawarathna mahathage upades matha wishesha polis kandayamak eeye (22) rangala pradeshayata gos parikshanayak sidukara thibe.lamayin kaෲrathwayata pathkirima sambandhawa eeta wagakiwayuthu ayata erehiwa nithiya thadin kriyathmaka karana bawa jyeshta niyojya polispathi gamini nawarathna mahatha kiya.daruwange gnyathin dedenaku prashna kirima sandaha polisiya athadanguwata gena thibe.
